front.title: Guidelines for Security Considerations of RATS

abstract.t: This document aims to provide guidelines and best practices for writing security considerations for technical specifications for RATS targeting the needs of implementers, researchers, and protocol designers. This is a work-in-progress, and the current version mainly presents an outline of the topics that future versions will cover in more detail. * Corrections in published RATS RFCs * Security concerns in two RATS drafts * General security guidelines, baseline, or template for RATS
